ch0138_00_orchid2/0101_0701_02_10:
I would quite like to see how you’re growing
stronger day by day as you travel around
the island of Pasio!
ch0138_00_orchid2/7101_0701_02_10:
They arise when the influences of a
particular region change a Pokémon’s
physical aspects—and even its type.
ch0138_00_orchid2/7101_0701_03_10:
I think people are much the same—we
adapt to our environment, too!
ch0138_00_orchid2/7101_0701_04_10:
Take Alola, for instance—people there
are often easygoing and open-minded.
ch0138_00_orchid2/7102_0701_01_10:
Pokémon that are regional variants have
appearances that are well suited to the
unique natural environments of their regions.
ch0138_00_orchid2/7102_0701_02_10:
However, some Pokémon have different
appearances depending on their habitats,
even if they come from the same region!
ch0138_00_orchid2/7102_0701_03_10:
What’s the difference between these two
cases? There’s a lot of research out there to
dive into!
ch0138_00_orchid2/7103_0701_01_10:
Even though regions and environments may
change, the connection between people and
Pokémon hasn’t.
ch0138_00_orchid2/7103_0701_02_10:
Seeing the sync pairs on Pasio really makes
me feel that!
ch0138_00_orchid2/7103_0701_03_10:
No matter what kind of Pokémon we might
come across in the future, I’m sure we’ll find
a way to coexist with them.
ch0138_00_orchid2/7104_0701_01_10:
At times, Pokémon thought to be the same
species because of similar appearances turn
out to be completely different species!
ch0138_00_orchid2/7104_0701_02_10:
There are quite a few Pokémon out there
like that.
ch0138_00_orchid2/7104_0701_03_10:
As a researcher of regional variants, I’m
always curious to know what made them
so alike!
ch0138_00_orchid2/7105_0701_02_10: but I’d say I’m pretty decent at battling, too!
ch0138_00_orchid2/7105_0701_03_10:
If you don’t mind, how about we have a
match, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0138_00_orchid2/7105_0701_04_10:
Now that I’m here on Pasio, I might as well
enjoy some battling!
ch0138_00_orchid2/1701_0701_01_10: Ah, perfect timing! Here, I’ll give you this!
ch0138_00_orchid2/2501_0701_01_10:
Have you ever heard of Alola’s sport,
Mantine Surfing?
ch0138_00_orchid2/2501_0701_02_10:
You ride a Mantine, surfing the waves
between islands while competing for the
highest score!
ch0138_00_orchid2/2501_0701_03_10:
It’s a bit tricky to get a hang of at first, but
once you get used to it...you’ll be hooked!
ch0138_00_orchid2/2501_0702_01_10:
To tell you the truth, I’m actually ranked
third in Mantine Surfing!
ch0138_00_orchid2/2501_0702_03_10:
Unless the records have been updated since
then...
ch0138_00_orchid2/2511_0701_01_10:
The Pokédex used in the Alola region is
powered by Rotom.
ch0138_00_orchid2/2511_0701_02_10:
The young fellow from Kalos who helped
invent that Pokédex put a lot of work
into it.
ch0138_00_orchid2/2511_0701_03_10:
And as much love and care as any parent
would—both for the Pokédex and Rotom!
ch0138_00_orchid2/2511_0702_01_10:
If you meet a Trainer with a Rotom Pokédex,
you should ask them to show it to you!
ch0138_00_orchid2/2511_0702_02_10: I’m sure Rotom would also want to chat!
ch0138_00_orchid2/3001_0701_01_10:
Oh, hello! Hello! Alola! I’d love some help
with my research if you’ve got some time.
ch0138_00_orchid2/3003_0701_01_10:
The beaches here on Pasio get some pretty
nice waves! What do you think? Care to
join me?
ch0138_00_orchid2/3005_0701_01_10:
In Alola, Pokémon called Minior drop down
from space just like falling stars.
